title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: Files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list under the File menu do not appear when a new session is started.
EB: Files should be persisted between sessions and appear in the MRU list under the File menu.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the software.
4. Open the software again.
5. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are listed.
